panels.title: Total network traffic outbound (+) and inbound (-) [bytes/sec]

options.content:
For more information about avaialble metrics from Amazon EC2, visit the [List of Available CloudWatch Metrics for Your EC2 Instances](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/viewing_metrics_with_cloudwatch.html) in the Amazon documentation.

For additional metrics and 1-minute granularity, enable [Detailed Monitoring](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-cloudwatch-new.html) for your Amazon EC2 instances.

This dashboard has been optimized for 1-minute metrics.
